sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1208919511 "FWD Accumulator sum field in SBR TAPs has incorrect access type documented" Regenerated the RDL files for CNLS to change the accumulator sum field in the SBR TAPs from RW to RO.
2. 1405289168 "FWD (PCR) IOSF SBR LTE (transparent bridge - router)" This is the beta release for the SBR LTE feature (transparent bridge). Alpha version of this feature was released in PICr15. This Beta release has limitations around mcast/bcast (currently not supported) and MI (transparent bridge PID strap not yet exposed - available as parameter only).
3. 1405304874 "Update SBR SubIP versions" Updated the DFX and STAP SubIP versions as per project requirements.
4. 1405330345 "Enhancement HSD for input flop timing of ISM inputs to synchronous endpoints in clkgaterst" To improve the timing on input ISM signals, flop stages had to be added to the asyncclkreq module in clkgaterst.
5. 1504333233 "(PCR) [ICP-N] enDEBUG: Support for policy 6 in DFX_SECURE_PLUGIN for TAP" Integrated new version of DFX secure plugin that supports/enable policy 6 as part of the chassis requirement for all IP's.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_knissues.sip_knissue:
HTML
"SVC does not scale for fabrics with more than 100 nodes"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2016WW42" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/appstore/article/#/sip.bugeco/create?=&subject=bugeco&tenant=sip

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=all&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
